so_65114884: files="$(date +%Y-%m-%d)*EHE"
foldername=$(date +%Y%m%d)
mkdir -p "$foldername"
for filename in $files; do  
    mv "$filename" "$foldername"
    echo "$filename $foldername" 
done

foldername=$1
files=$(echo $1 | sed 's/\(....\)\(..\)\(..\)/\1-\2-\3/')
filepattern="$files*EHE"
mkdir -p "$foldername"
for filename in $filepattern; do
  mv "$filename" "$foldername"
  echo "$filename $foldername"
done

so_21530556: for i in *
do 
  folder=${i%_*}                          # folder = COMPANY-ReportType
  folder="/mnt/folder/${folder//-//}"     # folder = /mnt/folder/COMPANY/ReportType
  mkdir -p "${folder}"     # mkdir with -p option: no error if existing, make parent directories as needed exist or not.
  mv "$i" "${folder}"      
done
